评论详情: My son loved this as a gift leading up to our Disney trip. The quality is great and seems like it will last a long time. It is soft and has several compartments for whatever is needed to store inside. Would purchase again!
My daughter love this wallet.

Everyone needs a STITCH wallet. This one is perfect for any Stitch lover. This wallet is a little larger than most, but I have another one the same style that I carry all the time. My favorite part is the two cash compartments. They are wide enough and deep enough. Easy to separate cash and deep enough if someone is looking they can't see that there is another cash department. Important to me. There are several of this style of wallet offered, you just have to search ;-)  My other on is pink with flowers and looks very beautiful and feminine.
So cute!

If you or your child wants a wallet get this one! It’s such good quality and so durable! Love this wallet!
We love Adventure Time. This BMO wallet has an inside zipper pouch for coins and this feature sold me to gift to my kid for their birthday.
This wallet is the perfect size,  color,  and value for a Kirby wallet.  So far it has withstood a year of wear and tear.  My daughter loves Kirby,  so this fit the bill..

This is a lot bigger than your standard wallet, I have only had this for about a week so I'm not sure about the wear down quality but it does seem to be made of cheap leather. However it is extremely cheap and good for the money, if you love adventure time like myself I don't believe you'll find a better deal, it doesn't have a lot of card holders but the coin pouch is neat.

It was dirty when it showed up. I had to clean it. Aside from that, it's a cute wallet.  The material is cheap but there are a lot of pockets and it gets the job done. I don't like the little stain on bmo's face though.

It is a little bit wide for me so not giving it a full 5 Star but I am using it everyday for 6 weeks and it is holding up zipper will hold coins I am a coin collector and will have up to 5 coins in the paper cas and it will be fine I keep 5 cards in it no problems yet........I do get a good amount of positive input from other people as I pay for things
I bought this for my little one. Overall good quality for the price, big enough to put money, her id, library card, and minor items for kids. I would purchase again if needed to.
i haven't had it long so I don't know how durable it will be but it looks and feels like a quality produce.  I would buy again

Like other people typed, you can't put too much inside the wallet otherwise it will start to get misshapen and bulge. I don't put much in my wallet anyway so this was a nonissue for me. I like the little zipper, my previous wallet didn't have zippers so my coins would fall out. I personally like that this wallet was quite big (my previous wallet was smaller and thus was harder to remove my credit cards). It's definitely not made to be durable for that long if you handle it roughly, just made to bring extra serotonin when taking it out hahha

Excellent for holding cash and cards with its horizontal pockets (they’re pretty deep so no need to worry about money falling out). Highly recommend for a simple wallet!

评论概述: I just really like BMO okay
评论详情: This is a pretty straightforward wallet, but it's super cute if you like Adventure Time. It's a bit on the large side, which clashes somewhat with modern wallets, but if you're looking at this that probably isn't a huge concern for you. The materials are a reasonable quality and the printing is clear and well laid. As a wallet, it's fairly basic, but it will do the job.
